snippet: Treated wastewater flows from taps, mortgage plan gives billions to homeowners but with exceptions, Tai Chi benefits patients with Parkinson's and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: Treated wastewater flows from taps, mortgage plan gives billions to homeowners but with exceptions, Tai Chi benefits patients with Parkinson's and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
lead_paragraph: A variety of consumer-focused articles appears daily in The New York Times and on our blogs. Each weekday morning, we gather them together here so you can quickly scan the news that could hit you in your wallet.

headline.main: Friday Reading: Treated Wastewater Flowing From Your Tap
